about_the_game:
Prana is a playful meditation experience that the user engages with their breath; employing physical breath to heal various creatures in their environment, while
learning to control their own breath and emotional state. Proprietary audio digital signal processing enables Prana to track breathing using the HMD’s built-in microphone.

Prana is intended for use as a calming non-competitive place for a few minutes of quiet wandering and healing each day. The experience is one of self-directed exploration and focus within a rich visual environment, as the player comes across ailing creatures and brings them back to health.
detailed_description:
Prana is a playful meditation experience that the user engages with their breath; employing physical breath to heal various creatures in their environment, while
learning to control their own breath and emotional state. Proprietary audio digital signal processing enables Prana to track breathing using the HMD’s built-in microphone.

Prana is intended for use as a calming non-competitive place for a few minutes of quiet wandering and healing each day. The experience is one of self-directed exploration and focus within a rich visual environment, as the player comes across ailing creatures and brings them back to health.
developers: Big Bright Monster (Art And Alchemy Ltd.)
name: Prana

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Titan X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

publishers: Big Bright Monster (Art And Alchemy Ltd.)
